billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Relates to a residential housing downpayment credit
summary: Relates to a residential housing downpayment credit; provides that such tax credit is in the amount of 10 percent of the purchase price, or twenty-five thousand dollars, whichever is less.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to a residential housing downpayment credit against the tax on personal income
